heading.usage: All H1-H3 headings. Use italic variant for emphasis words.

body.usage: Body text, UI elements, buttons, inputs.

accent.usage: Small annotations, 'handwritten' notes on the itinerary.

primary.description: Deep Teal - Represents the ocean and depth. Use for primary buttons, active states, and key branding.

secondary.description: Sunset Orange - Represents adventure and warmth. Use sparingly for high-priority CTAs (e.g., 'Generate Itinerary').

accent.description: Mint Foam - Soft, fresh accent. Use for success states, highlights, or decorative backgrounds.

background.description: Warm Stone - A soft, organic off-white. Never use pure #FFFFFF for the main page background.

grids.timeline: flex flex-col space-y-8 relative border-l-2 border-primary/20 ml-4 pl-8

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border-2 border-primary/10 hover:border-primary/30 hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium
buttons.cta: bg-secondary text-white hover:bg-secondary/90 shadow-orange-500/20 shadow-lg hover:shadow-orange-500/40 hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-10 py-4 text-xl font-bold

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-border/50 shadow-[0_2px_10px_-2px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)] hover:shadow-[0_10px_30px_-5px_rgba(0,0,0,0.1)] transition-all duration-300

inputs.base: bg-white border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-xl h-12 px-4 transition-all

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain overlays (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to avoid 'digital flatness'.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px. Use 'MapPin', 'Calendar', 'Compass', 'Sun', 'Moon', 'Coffee' for itinerary items.

images.strategy: Since image selector failed, use high-quality Unsplash images manually or placeholders.

placeholders.description: Wide shot of a traveler looking at a mountain range or ocean sunset. Inspiring, vast.
Group of friends laughing at a dinner table outdoors or hiking together. Candid, warm.
Flatlay of travel essentials: camera, map, passport, sunglasses. Minimalist.

setup: Install fonts: 'Playfair Display', 'DM Sans', 'Caveat' via Google Fonts.
Configure Tailwind theme with the colors and radius defined above.
implementation_rules: DO NOT use default Shadcn styling. Override radius to '0.75rem' and use the 'Organic' color palette.
For the Itinerary Timeline: Use a vertical line on the left. Each 'Day' is a section. Each 'Activity' is a card connected to the line.
For the Form: Split it into 3 steps: 1. Basics (Where/When), 2. Vibe (Who/Style), 3. Specifics (Hectic/Interests). Do not show a giant wall of inputs.
Use the 'Caveat' font for small 'AI suggestions' or 'Travel Tips' that appear like sticky notes.
Ensure the 'Login with Google' button is prominent on the Landing Page, styled as a white card with the Google logo and 'Continue with Google' text.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without hierarchy.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
